name: CUSTOM Back to top arrow
description: Section: CUSTOM Back to top arrow
liquid_code:
<style>
  .ss-back-to-top-arrow-{{ section.id }} {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: var(--y-dst-to-edge);
    background-color: var(--bg-color, #fff);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color, #000);
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    cursor: pointer;
    z-index: 999;
    display: none;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  .ss-back-to-top-arrow-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    scale: 1.1;
  }
  @media screen and (max-width: 749.9px) {
    .ss-back-to-top-arrow-{{ section.id }}-hide-on-mobile {
      display: none;
    }
  }
</style>

<button
  class="
    ss-back-to-top-arrow-{{ section.id }}
    {% if section.settings.hide_on_mobile %}
      ss-back-to-top-arrow-{{ section.id }}-hide-on-mobile
    {% endif %}
  "
  id="custom-back-to-top-arrow-{{ section.id }}"
  style="
    --x-dst-to-edge: {{ section.settings.horizontal_dst_to_edge }}px;
    {% if section.settings.pos == 'left' %}
      left: var(--x-dst-to-edge);
    {% elsif section.settings.pos == 'center' %}
      left: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
    {% elsif section.settings.pos == 'right' %}
      right: var(--x-dst-to-edge);
    {% endif %}

    --y-dst-to-edge: {{ section.settings.vertical_dst_to_edge }}px;
    --border-color: {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    --bg-color: {{ section.settings.bg_color }};

    width: {{ section.settings.button_size }}px;
    height: {{ section.settings.button_size }}px;
  "
  aria-label="Back to top"
  type="button"
>
  <svg
    style="
      color: {{ section.settings.arrow_color }};
      width: {{ section.settings.arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ section.settings.arrow_size }}px;
    "
    stroke="currentColor"
    fill="currentColor"
    stroke-width="0"
    viewBox="0 0 512 512"
    height="1em"
    width="1em"
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  >
    <path d="M256 217.9L383 345c9.4 9.4 24.6 9.4 33.9 0 9.4-9.4 9.3-24.6 0-34L273 167c-9.1-9.1-23.7-9.3-33.1-.7L95 310.9c-4.7 4.7-7 10.9-7 17s2.3 12.3 7 17c9.4 9.4 24.6 9.4 33.9 0l127.1-127z"></path>
  </svg>
</button>

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    var backToTopArrow = document.getElementById(
      'ss-back-to-top-arrow-{{ section.id }}'
    );
    backToTopArrow.addEventListener('click', function () {
      window.scrollTo({
        top: 0,
        behavior: 'smooth',
      });
    });
    // it only shows when the view is 20% from bottom of the page:
    const precentOfPage = 1 - {{ section.settings.show_when_precent_of_page }} / 100;
    if(precentOfPage === 1) {
      backToTopArrow.style.display = 'block';
      backToTopArrow.style.opacity = '1';
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('scroll', function () {
      if (
        window.scrollY >
        precentOfPage * (document.body.scrollHeight - window.innerHeight)
      ) {
        backToTopArrow.style.display = 'block';
        backToTopArrow.style.opacity = '1';
      } else {
        backToTopArrow.style.display = 'none';
        backToTopArrow.style.opacity = '0';
      }
    });
    }

  });
</script>

show_when_precent_of_page.label: Show when the view is X% from bottom of the page
show_when_precent_of_page.description: 0% means it will always show, 100% means it will never show
